com.facebook.ads

Interface RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Ad.LoadConfigBuilder
    Enclosing class:
    RewardedVideoAd

    public static interface RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder
extends Ad.LoadConfigBuilder
    Builder that allows to configure an ad loading.
    Since:
    5.6

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig build()
      Builds a RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoLoadAdConfig that can be used to load an ad.

      Specifies AdExperience for the ad

      Sets an RewardedVideoAdListener to be notified on events in control lifecycle.

      Allow to load an ad from the payload supplied with a bid.

      Specifies if load should fail when assets were not cached successfully.

      • withRVChainEnabled

        @Deprecated
RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder withRVChainEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Deprecated. since 5.7
        This behavior is no longer supported.

        Whether we should enable RV ads to be shown in succession after the previous one finishes. This will typically be used by apps that offer a repetitive reward that users can collect multiple times. Eg. Get n lives for a game.

        Parameters:
        enabled - if chain of Rewarded Video Ads is enabled.
        Returns:
        RewardedVideoAd.RewardedVideoAdLoadConfigBuilder
